com.defano.jmonet.tools

Class MagnifierTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.BasicTool
      • com.defano.jmonet.tools.MagnifierTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SurfaceInteractionObserver, Tool, KeyListener, EventListener

    public class MagnifierTool
extends BasicTool
implements SurfaceInteractionObserver
    Tool that changes the scale factor of the canvas and adjusts the scroll position to re-center the scaled image in the scrollable viewport.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cursor getDefaultCursor() 
      Cursor getZoomCursor()
      Gets the cursor displayed when the user presses the control or meta key (indicating they wish to reset the canvas scale to 1.0).
      Cursor getZoomInCursor()
      Gets the cursor displayed when the user is pressing no modifier keys (indicating they wish to zoom-in on the canvas).
      Cursor getZoomOutCursor()
      Gets the cursor that is displayed when the user is pressing the shift key (indicating they wish to zoom out from the canvas).
      void keyPressed(KeyEvent e)
      Invoked when a key has been pressed.
      void keyReleased(KeyEvent e)
      Invoked when a key has been released.
      void mousePressed(MouseEvent e, Point clickLoc)
      Invoked when a mouse button has been pressed on a component.
      void setZoomCursor(Cursor zoomCursor)
      Sets the cursor displayed when the user presses the control or meta key (indicating they wish to reset the canvas scale to 1.0)
      void setZoomInCursor(Cursor zoomInCursor)
      Sets the cursor displayed when the user is pressing no modifier keys (indicating they wish to zoom-in on the canvas).
      void setZoomOutCursor(Cursor zoomOutCursor)
      Sets the cursor displayed when the user is pressing the shift key (indicating they wish to zoom out from the canvas).
      void zoomIn()
      Multiplies the scale of the canvas this tool is currently active on by the value returned from ToolAttributes.getMagnificationStep().
      void zoomOut()
      Divides the scale of the canvas this tool is currently active on by the value returned from ToolAttributes.getMagnificationStep().

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e,
                         Point clickLoc)
        Invoked when a mouse button has been pressed on a component.
        Specified by:
        mousePressed in interface SurfaceInteractionObserver
        Parameters:
        e - The mouse event that occurred
        clickLoc - The location (relative to the canvas) where the event occurred, taking into account scale, grid and scroll pane complications as appropriate.

      • zoomIn

        public void zoomIn()
        Multiplies the scale of the canvas this tool is currently active on by the value returned from ToolAttributes.getMagnificationStep(). Does not change the scroll position of the canvas.

      • zoomOut

        public void zoomOut()
        Divides the scale of the canvas this tool is currently active on by the value returned from ToolAttributes.getMagnificationStep(). Does not change the scroll position of the canvas.

      • getZoomCursor

        public Cursor getZoomCursor()
        Gets the cursor displayed when the user presses the control or meta key (indicating they wish to reset the canvas scale to 1.0).
        Returns:
        The reset-zoom cursor.

        public void setZoomCursor(Cursor zoomCursor)
        Sets the cursor displayed when the user presses the control or meta key (indicating they wish to reset the canvas scale to 1.0)
        Parameters:
        zoomCursor - The reset-zoom cursor.

        public Cursor getZoomInCursor()
        Gets the cursor displayed when the user is pressing no modifier keys (indicating they wish to zoom-in on the canvas).

        The zoom-in cursor.

        public Cursor getZoomOutCursor()

        The zoom-out cursor.
